altTitles.ja-ro: Chou ni Naru Hi {The Day which became a Butterfly}

altTitles.en: The Day I Become a Butterfly
The Day which Became a Butterfly

description.en:
1) The Day I Become a Butterfly  
There is a rumor going around school that Mikami can “hear” when one’s death is near. Uka has just turned fifteen, but doesn’t know how much longer he’ll live… Will the budding love between Mikami and Uka have a happy ending?  
  
2) You At the End (Hate Ni Aru Kimi)  
A short story about a guy sick of this world and the silent, unlikely boy who anchors him to it.  
  
3) The Lonely War  
Can men and women have platonic friendships? Suzu is determined to try.  
  
4) Blue Cat's Tunnel  
A story about one girl's hope to find a way out of her life…  
  
5) Tokyo Alien Yulala  
A young student's trouble understanding his classmate makes him think the boy may be an alien.  
  
6) Planet Yours  
An abused boy has trouble relying on his friends.
description.pt-br: Uka é um garoto de 15 anos que possui uma doença terminal. Por isso, era tratado por todos como uma boneca de porcelana. Uka ouve boatos de que Mikami, um cara emburrado do colégio, pode ouvir quando a morte de uma pessoa está próxima. Será que ele sabe se o fim de Uka está próximo?

biography.en:
Known as YUMEKA Sumomo (**夢花李**) in the **BL** community, but has also published under the names SAHARA Mizu (**佐原 ミズ**) for her **seinen** works, SAHARA Keita (**佐原恵太**) for her **shoujo** works and Chikyuya/Sasshi (**地球屋/さっし**) for **doujinshi**.

In her epilogues, she often describes herself as not satisfied with what she has done but is grateful to the people she works with. She is rumored to be a layout artist for Studio Ghibli.
